item.description:
!!Lovely Ladies!!

With the Winter season already here and a snow blizzard behind us, why not add a little ice skating? As one who has NEVER, EVER ice skated before, I figured a lil bruising wouldn't hurt. As a fan of the Winter Olympics with ice skating as one of my favoritie things to watch, and the movie, "The Cutting Edge", I figured why not finally try to ice skate? So I invite you to come try ice skating with me! I will personally buy my own knee pads and hopefully invest in a butt pad before I head out to the skating pavilion. If you are a beginner like me, well, I definately think you should do the same (lol).

Queens offers a really nice price: $8 admission and $5 for skate rentals. They close at 8:20 p.m on fridays so I figure 6:30 would be a good time to let the bruising start!!

Location: City Ice Pavilion
47-32 32nd Pl
Long Island City, NY 11101

Total cost: $13
item.name: Ice Skating, Knee Pads, and Toe Picks
